name: Elegant Garden Wedding
description: A romantic outdoor wedding set in a lush garden with blooming flowers, a grand arch, and soft candlelit ambiance.

name: Superhero Adventure Bash
description: An action-packed birthday party where kids can become their favorite superheroes.complete with thrilling challenges

name: Golden Anniversary Dinner
description: An intimate dinner gathering to mark 50 years of wedded bliss, with heartfelt toasts and family memories.

name: Engagement Garden Soiree
description: A charming garden party to celebrate the newly engaged couple with floral arrangements and champagne toasts.

name: Retirement Roast and Toast
description: A serene retreat-style retirement party, where the retiree can unwind and reflect on their career journey.

name: Gender Reveal Garden Party
description: A garden party to reveal the baby's gender, with suspense and excitement as the big moment approaches.
